cz.dhl.swing
Class JCoDirComboBox

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JComboBox
                  cz.dhl.swing.JCoDirComboBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, javax.swing.event.ListDataListener, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class JCoDirComboBox
extends javax.swing.JComboBox

Swing Directory Selector Combo Box Component.

To listen for dir selection events:
dirChoice.setDirActionListener(new ActionListener()
{  public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
   {  myDirSelectHandler(); } } );

Version:
0.72 08/10/2003
Author:
Bea Petrovicova
See Also:
File, Serialized Form

setDirActionListener

public void setDirActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
Sets an ActionListener. The listener will receive an action event the user finishes making a dir selection.
